Made by Delil Ds in 2019, this app was created to publish the top and most important news around the globe. 
 
What makes this app different from other news apps? With our app you are free from all the unnecessary adds. We do publish news from websites such as CNN and BBC, in our app the users will get a link to the source of the published News. In this way, those who wants to dig deeper into a specific topic will have the opportunity to do so. 
 
Our app does also have a special section for only Swedish news. This section will be useful for those who live in and even outside of Sweden.
